message: I propose we divide the money with a 3:1 ratio, where I receive $7500 and you receive $2500.
I propose a 60:40 split, a fair compromise
Considering the inflation, I propose a 60:40 split, where I receive $6000 and you receive $4000. This maintains fairness while accounting for the decrease in value of money.
I'll give you a slightly higher share to make up for the inflation, but I still want to keep a majority
